articles.description: Julien Alfred storms to the women's 100m title at Paris 2024 to make history as St Lucia's first Olympic medallist.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Julien Alfred wins 100m gold for St Lucia

articles.description: American gymnast Simone Biles wins her third Olympic gold of the Paris Games by taking the vault title in emphatic fashion.
articles.title: Olympics gymnastics: Simone Biles wins vault for third gold medal of Paris 2024

articles.description: After their most successful opening week to a summer Olympics ever, Team GB showed no signs of slowing down on day eight with gold and bronze in the rowing
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top stories so far from day eight of Games

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Katie Ledecky equals the record for the most gold medals by a female Olympian as she claims the 800m freestyle title at the Paris Games.
articles.title: Katie Ledecky wins record-equalling ninth Olympic gold with women's 800m freestyle victory

articles.description: Pau Victor scores twice as Barcelona beat Spanish rivals and La Liga champions Real Madrid in a friendly in the United States of America.
articles.title: Victor scores twice as Barcelona beat Real Madrid in US friendly

articles.description: Great Britain's Jake Jarman takes bronze in the men's floor final, the nation's first artistic gymnastics medal of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Jake Jarman takes floor bronze for GB

articles.description: Liverpool make it three wins from three on their US tour with a 3-0 win against Manchester United in Columbia, in front of 77,559 fans.
articles.title: Liverpool 3-0 Man Utd: Carvalho, Jones and Tsimikas on target in easy Reds win

articles.description: Jamaican sprint icon Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce withdraws from the Olympic 100m competition before her semi-final at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Jamaican Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce withdraws from Olympic 100m
